name: Polyman's Adventure
description:
Alpha Build,Feedback Appreciated!

(Please Do not take this build as a representation of the final game as many features may come or go)

Polyman's Adventure is a W.I.P Low Poly Top Down Shooter where you play as a lone mercenary/contractor (PolyMan)

Accept Contracts,Survive,Eliminate rogue drones,Earn some credits and buy new stuff!

Controls

-Esc for Ingame pause menu and 'E' to resume the game

-Run With LSHIFT

-Change guns with 1-5 Number Keys

-W/S for Forward/Backward Movement

-Mouse to Change Movement Direction.
